channel.title: 317 EternalScape ECO+PK Server
channel.description:
This server is coming soon. So sign up now :)
HOME: [url=http://www.eternalscape.org]www.eternalscape.org[/url] FORUMS: [url=http://www.eternalscape.org/forums]www.eternalscape.org/forums[/url]
Features: Instant Switching Great Economy Stable base Donator Privileges 317 with PRE HD Graphics Automatic client updates Skillcape emotes All godsword animations All skills working Fight Pits Fully working Jad Pest Control Clan chat
More features are also coming soon.
Pictures are also coming soon!

item.title: 317 EternalScape ECO+PK Server
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Seeing as this is an advertisement section and you did not provide client downloads/webclient links, I’m going to have to lock this for the time being. Feel free to message me when you’re ready to advertise correctly and I’ll gladly unlock this for you.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 EternalScape ECO+PK Server
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

If it’s coming soon… How can it have a great economy? You also do not explain what the XP rate is, so it is unclear whether or not the eco part is correct even in the future.
